plot: When married waiter Ben develops feelings for his new coworker, Anna, the two must navigate the murky waters of friendship and fidelity together.
title: On Friendship and Fidelity
plot_es: When married waiter Ben develops feelings for his new coworker, Anna, the two must navigate the murky waters of friendship and fidelity together.
plot_en: When married waiter Ben develops feelings for his new coworker, Anna, the two must navigate the murky waters of friendship and fidelity together.
